balance_of_plant.documentation: Electricial and thermal power balance of the plant

balance_of_plant.Q_plant.documentation: Electricity gain of the plant (ratio of net electric / plant electricity during operation)

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.breeder.H.documentation: Temperature of working fluid at the outlet heat exchanger before the breeder circulator

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.breeder.c.documentation: Power required to circulate breeder fluid

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.breeder.e.documentation: The amount the breeder will have to cool before being re-circulated

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.breeder.f.documentation: Mass flow rate of working fluid

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.breeder.h.documentation: Heat power supplied from to power cycle from the breeder fluid
Neutron power absorbed by the breeder
Temperature of working fluid at the outlet of the breeder

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.breeder.i.documentation: Temperature of working fluid at the inlet to the wall

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.breeder.o.documentation: Temperature of working fluid at the outlet of the wall

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.divertor..documentation: Temperature of working fluid at the outlet heat exchanger before the divertor circulator
Power required to circulate divertor fluid
Mass flow rate of working fluid
Heat power supplied from to power cycle from the divertor fluid
Heat power absorbed by the system within the divertor
Heat that is unable to be transferred to the cycle
Temperature of working fluid at the inlet to the divertor
Temperature of working fluid at the outlet of the divertor

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.wall.HX_o.documentation: Temperature of working fluid at the outlet heat exchanger before the wall circulator

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.wall.circ.documentation: Power required to circulate wall fluid

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.wall.flow.documentation: Mass flow rate of working fluid

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.wall.heat.documentation: Heat power supplied from to power cycle from the wall fluid
Heat power absorbed by the coolant within the wall
Temperature of working fluid at the outlet of the wall

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.wall.inle.documentation: Temperature of working fluid at the inlet to the wall

balance_of_plant.heat_transfer.wall.outl.documentation: Temperature of working fluid at the outlet of the wall

balance_of_plant.power_cycle_type.documentation: Thermodynamic power cycle used for electricity generation

balance_of_plant.power_electric_plant_op.documentation: Index of the system, used to generate functions
Electrical power used to operate the system
Index of the system, used to generate functions
Electrical power used to operate the system

balance_of_plant.thermal_cycle.flow_rate.documentation: Mass flow rate of the working fluid in the power cycle

balance_of_plant.thermal_cycle.generator.documentation: Conversion efficiency of thermal to electric power of the steam cycle

balance_of_plant.thermal_cycle.input_wor.documentation: Total mechanical work required for pumps and compressors in the power cycle

balance_of_plant.thermal_cycle.net_work.documentation: Net mechanical work input to electric generator

balance_of_plant.thermal_cycle.power_ele.documentation: Total electric power coming out of the electric generator

balance_of_plant.thermal_cycle.system[:].documentation: Reclaiment efficiency of the energy flow of the system
Index of the system, used to generate functions
Heat flow rate from the system to the steam cycle

balance_of_plant.thermal_cycle.thermal_e.documentation: Fractional thermal effeciency of power cycle

balance_of_plant.thermal_cycle.total_use.documentation: Total thermal power supplied from the divertor, wall and breeder

balance_of_plant.thermal_cycle.turbine_w.documentation: Total mechanical work output of the thermal cycle
